mainText:
Living, breathing, working and enjoying life here in the silicon valley from '96 and

and knowing technology geniuses such as "the great Steve Jobs" lived here amongst us, we took it for granted and now

to hear he is no longer amidst us is impossible to believe.

But Steve continues to be with us all thru his babies the gadgets me you and the kids all love and cherish!

My family and I pray for his family and friends at this sad moment.
header: Steve will forever be in our memory and with us, yes forever!
author: Raj
